name: A fig leaf
data: It has awesome armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It gives great bonus to the skill 'desecrate corpse'.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'artistic license'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'thrusting polearms'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'make disguise wax'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'anatomy'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'barbs'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'hammer'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'quick thrusts'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'arrow handling'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'zombie chomp'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'extract bodypart'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'hide the sausage'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'assemble
